#summary Some project ideas that might work for the Google's summer of code.

== Detailed ideas ==

  * See Issues for more details. 

  * Reach the capabilities of Ginac
  * symbolic matrices
  * symbolic integration. 
  * implement factorisation
  * asymptotic expansion
  * equations solving
  * complex numbers in sin, cos,...
  * objects with indices (tensors)
